    • callTrial

      public void callTrial() throws RemoteException
      The referee calls the trial. The referee waits for the coaches to be ready to receive the command to call the trial. The coaches will know the match has not ended.
      Specified by:
      callTrial in interface IRefereeSite_Referee
      Throws:
      RemoteException - a remote exception

    • declareGameWinner

      The referee declares the team that won the game.
      Specified by:
      declareGameWinner in interface IRefereeSite_Referee
      Parameters:
      team - the team that won the game
      knockout - true if the game was a knockout, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - a remote exception

    • declareMatchWinner

      public void declareMatchWinner(int team) throws RemoteException
      The referee declares the team that won the match. The referee waits for the coaches to be ready to receive the command to declare the match winner. The coaches will know the match has ended.
      Specified by:
      declareMatchWinner in interface IRefereeSite_Referee
      Parameters:
      team - the team that won the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - a remote exception
